attributes.action: It's now the time to arrest Anjem Choudary and other hate preachers
attributes.additional_details: I think it is now time  for police to arrest people like Anjem Choudray and other hate preachers like him. Why should he be allowed to get away with his messages of hate against Britain and it's people when others who are simply giving their opinions, are arrested for racism.

rejection.details: The investigation of an individual is a matter for the relevant police force.
